name: ASTRAMATIC, S.A.U.
goal: Astramatic belongs to Fluidra Group, and it's specialized in industrial and municipal water treatment by means of processes and techniques of desalination, purification, treatment of inflow and process water, industrial waste water treatment, recycling of water, thus providing the market with a wide range of solutions related to water recovery and use, adapted always to costumer requirements.
euInitiatives: Processes and techniques of desalination, purification, treatment of inflow and process water, industrial waste water treatment, recycling of water, etc And search solutions related to water recovery.
